named-query.name: consulta.auditorias.institucion
named-query.query: select o from Auditoria o where o.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.audFechaInicioProgramado between ?2 and ?3 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: consulta.auditoria.no.finalizada
named-query.query: select o from Auditoria o where o.regActivo = 1 and o.audFase not in (5) and o.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1

named-query.name: consulta.actividades.list.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Actividad o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.responsables.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from AuditoriaResponsable o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.programa.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from ProgramaPlanificacion o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.procedimientos.planificacion.by.programa
named-query.query: select o from ProcedimientoPlanificacion o where o.programaPlanificacion.prpId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.programa.ejecucion.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from ProgramaEjecucion o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.procedimientos.ejecucion.by.programa
named-query.query: select o from ProcedimientoEjecucion o where o.programaEjecucion.preId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.notas.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from CedulaNota o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.seguimiento.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Seguimiento o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.recomendacioens.by.cedula.nota
named-query.query: select o from Recomendacion o where o.cedulaNota.cedId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: consulta.hallazgos.no.finalizados
named-query.query: select o from CedulaNota o where o.auditoria.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1 and o.cedEstado in (1,2,3,4,5,6)

named-native-query.name: consulta.stat.auditoria.estado
named-native-query.query: select TOTAL, sum(case when fase = "PROGRAMADA" then sub else 0 end) as "PROGRAMADA", sum(case when fase = "PLANIFICACION" then sub else 0 end) as "PLANIFICACION", sum(case when fase = "EJECUCION" then sub else 0 end) as "EJECUCION", sum(case when fase = "INFORME" then sub else 0 end) as "INFORME", sum(case when fase = "SEGUIMIENTO" then sub else 0 end) as "SEGUIMIENTO", sum(case when fase = "FINALIZADA" then sub else 0 end) as "FINALIZADA" from ( select "TOTAL", case when aud_fase = 0 then "PROGRAMADA" when aud_fase = 1 then "PLANIFICACION" when aud_fase = 2 then "EJECUCION" when aud_fase = 3 then "INFORME" when aud_fase = 4 then "SEGUIMIENTO" when aud_fase = 5 then "FINALIZADA" end as fase, count(aud_id) sub from audigoes.auditoria a inner join audigoes.plan_anual b on a.aud_pla_id = b.pla_id where reg_activo = 1 and b.pla_ins_id = ?1 and aud_ and aud_fecha_inicio_programado between ?2 and ?3 group by aud_fase )as r
